<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/80361a5f2b134c88597d60b3d363b52084e712a1|patch 8.2.1805: Unix: terminal mode changed when using ":shell">
patch 8.2.1805: Unix: terminal mode changed when using ":shell"

Problem:    Unix: terminal mode changed when using ":shell".
Solution:   Avoid calling settmode() when not needed. (issue #7079)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1805: Unix: terminal mode changed when using ":shell" · vim/vim@80361a5
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1805: Unix: terminal mode changed when using ":shell" · vim/vim@80361a5
attachments.text: Problem: Unix: terminal mode changed when using ":shell". Solution: Avoid calling settmode() when not needed. (issue #7079)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/50c4e9e08fb0981892e33afb9fe3751aa6df1fa4|patch 8.2.1804: resolve('/') returns an empty string>
patch 8.2.1804: resolve('/') returns an empty string

Problem:    resolve('/') returns an empty string.
Solution:   Don't remove single slash. (closes #7074)

attachments.text: Problem: resolve('/') returns an empty string. Solution: Don't remove single slash. (closes #7074)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/44aefffaad067886d266999cd17cf852b2a7e0b9|patch 8.2.1802: Vim9: crash with unterminated dict>
patch 8.2.1802: Vim9: crash with unterminated dict

Problem:    Vim9: crash with unterminated dict. (Dhiraj Mishra)
Solution:   Return empty string instead of NULL. (closes #7084)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1802: Vim9: crash with unterminated dict · vim/vim@44aefff

attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: crash with unterminated dict. (Dhiraj Mishra) Solution: Return empty string instead of NULL. (closes #7084)
